website_summaries.verdict: All-in-all, the feedback given to the Salomon Supercross has been positive. Many of those who have tried it are in agreement when it comes to the quality of the build and the efficacy of the design. The traction-ready outsole, the single-pull lacing system, and the foot-welcoming interior chamber put a spotlight on this running shoe. On the other hand, some complaints churn the opposite of satisfaction as runners note the smaller-than-usual sizing scheme, as well as the mud-attracting lacing system.The Salomon Supercross is made for fans of Salomon trail running shoes and those who have neutral foot pronation.
pros: Several testers claim that the forefoot section of the Salomon Supercross allows their toes to splay naturally
The Quicklace® system has gained some fans who desire a fit adjustment method that is effortless and barely-there
Some consumers feel that the weight of this Salomon running shoe is lighter than other trail-optimized athletic footwear
The outsole unit is praised for offering a reliable grip on soft and muddy terrains
Most purchasers laud the padded collar and tongue, stating that these elements permit them to feel secure and locked in place
The cushioning system is perceived to be highly comfortable and capable of maintaining a well-rounded heel-to-toe transition
cons: The shoelaces were too long, according to some reviewers
A couple of runners have raised complaints about the securing tab of the Quicklace® getting clogged up with mud

customer_reviews.title: Salomon Supercross are Super duty sneakers
customer_reviews.text: So far so good....They fit great and are very comfortable to run and walk in. Lite on your feet. Easy to lace up and take off. They look great in tactical pants and class B pants. Easy to clean. Wish they came in a high/mid top for ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Vader

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe. True sizing.
customer_reviews.text: These fit with more width in the toe area than the speadcross 4's. They are comfortable and true to size, unlike the speedcross 4. These supercross' have a softer, likely less durable lining inside the shoe but are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, good traction and quality. a little larger than my other salomons.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, but they fit about a half size bigger than my xa's. Other than that, light weight and comfortable. good traction.
customer_reviews.author: tobias e greider

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, a lace pocket would be better.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that you cannot hide the laces like most Salomon shoes. Over time the laces stretch and tend to hang and bang against your shoe while running.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I wear these out in about 3 months but they're comfortable until then. My only wish is that they last longer without breaking down inside.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe I've ever had on my feet
customer_reviews.text: This will my 4th pair of Salomon's I've had and these are amazing. The raised treads provide an extra layer of cushion and it feels like my feet are surrounded by pockets of gel. I've been walking for 5 miles a day in order to get ready to start jogging and I can't wait to put these shoes to the test at sunrise.
customer_reviews.author: Maikeru

customer_reviews.title: Another great Model from Salomon.
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Salomon's forever and I am a flat wide foot and some of the Salomon models has wide sizes. This one does not have but I gambled, anyways I could always exchange it with Amazon. I wear a size 9 Salomon and this fits like a glove. Lightweight aggressive and looks are great, I can even use it for work as it is all black. Like it so much. No pressure points that hurts. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shoxpro

customer_reviews.title: Very stable shoe and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Took this product to Alaska fishing and hiking. Shoes performed extremely well. The enviroment was July 2020 weather was summer like. Very good tracktion on the fishing boats and on the trails!!! Quick tie and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a penny.
customer_reviews.text: Look I was sucked in by the price. But these shoes are absolutely horrible. Hence why so cheap. My feet hurt so bad I can not barely walk after two days. Pure pain in the top of my foot. The lace thing doesn’t stay tight always comes loose. I recommend this brand usually but not these shoes at all. I’m definitely going to return these things.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I must order a size larger with this manufacture. The color is not as pictured, seems silver more so than white in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Trail Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought this shoe from Salomon but was so happy when I could find it through Amazon in my size. A great shoe for hiking or running around town. Very lightweight and easy drying. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe with good support
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13 year old son and he loves them! He has a long slender foot and they fit him great and give good support.
customer_reviews.author: DELT

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable inner soles!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these running/walking and workout sneakers/shoes! The overall design with the quick/fast lacing system is perfect! The lightweight material and construction is excellent! Best and absolute most comfortable inner sole (Ortholite) of any running/workout shoes that I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Winning777

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear 9.5 to 10 but for running I like one size larger than street shoes, I wear 11. This fits just like Addidas. Went for a run today and it felt super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Baktash Bootorabi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: Had this pair for a few months now. Fit is prefect I'm a 12 and these fit like all other Salomon size 12. Absolutely comfortable trail hiking/running shoe, I would highly recommend. If your trails are fairly rocky you might want something with a stiffer sole like an approach shoe but for straight dirt and light rocks these are the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: long range

customer_reviews.title: Great disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I use Salomon for trail running and have purchased most of their products through the last 8 years. This is by far the worst shoe I’ve ever try. The interior heel fabric although soft started peeling off on mile 20ish in both shoes. Too bad for an overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dimi

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Always quality with Salomon. These shoes hold up well over time. A rare event nowadays!
customer_reviews.author: Dione Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent alternative for me in place of a full work boot. Extremely comfortable and the grip is solid. No worry about slipping on wet ground. I went a half size up since my usual size fit a little tight from side to side. The speed lacing is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Discounted for a reason...
customer_reviews.text: Usually like Salomon - one of the best outdoor brands. But these are bad. The toe box is narrow and the amount of heel cushion is insanely overdone. The result - a bad fitting shoe that will severely affect your natural gait. 14 miles and serious back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Luc

customer_reviews.title: Love the lace system
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 13 in alpha cross, alpha cross gtx, super cross and the only one that was snug was the gtx. Good fit! Not bad for a day on your feet walking around on smooth surfaces. Haven’t tried them on the trail yet. So far the seems are not coming unglued which seems to be common for the alpha and super cross line.
customer_reviews.author: ssgray

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit off
customer_reviews.text: These would qualify as “I got what I paid for”. I’m a big fan of Salomon Trail shoes, but this go round I opted for the cheapest ones I could find on Amazon. Long story short, buy the next one up in price. These remind me of the discounted stuff you can buy at Outlet Malls. Yay, it’s name brand but you can tell the product quality is just a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: emc

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not the Salomon I expected. Narrow and just not comfortable like my older versions.
customer_reviews.author: IdahoPhil63

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, super comfortable and tread lasts forever. I wear everyday all day. Purchased for golf but loved so much I use for everyday wear. Couldn't be happier. Just purchased my 4th pair. Do run about 1/2 size larger than all my other Salomons
customer_reviews.author: Dean Carter

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst shoes I ever bought, I get blisters all the time because of the high heel thing, the shoe laces suuuucks!! I had only whore them like 5 times in 6 months I wish I can return them but ...too late
customer_reviews.author: Iker Rossainz

customer_reviews.title: I can see how they wear out
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these but I can see why the back of the shoe wears out. They actually fit great but rub against the ankle, which was too painful to keep. Easy return, not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very narrow. For a size 14 shoe these are too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: bj moore

customer_reviews.title: No area for shoe strings
customer_reviews.text: Why would you make these with no where to put the shoe strings? In all other Salomon shoes there is a tuck away area under the tongue of the shoe. I’d rate this zero stars. Terrible idea you have to tuck these on the inside of your shoe or find a place and it’s not near as secure as other shoes. Bad idea
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These seem a little bit larger than the Salomon shoes I bought a couple of years ago. Great quality and style.
customer_reviews.author: WorleyBird

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: How can i return the shoes to get a replacement. the back part by the heels split on both sides and its tearing my heals up. i need a new pair. this pair was cheap. how do i contact the seller to get the replacement? if anyone can help that would be great. they are on 3 months old
customer_reviews.author: Jason h

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, comfort, style, durability....
customer_reviews.text: Since my first purchase of Salomon sneakers I have not purchased a different manufacturer. Love the design, fit, quality...
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: SO SO....
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear the SPEEDCROSS..decided to try these, they’re ok but the SPEEDCROSS IS BETTER! Will be going bk to the SPEEDS after these wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Sean B. Gallaway

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy any other brands! Salomon are Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried 5 different brands including Under Armour and Adidas. These are the best trail runners there are... period.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy.  Great grip.  Fit really big - order smaller
customer_reviews.text: I'm size 12 to 12.5 in almost every brand. Had to go down to 11.5. Really comfortable on train run or tough incline hike. Great grip
customer_reviews.author: Airlisle

customer_reviews.title: Buy these if you trail run
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome trail shoes. Plenty of traction and support. I love the lace/tightening system, you get an extremely nice fit with it.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Eastwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for Hiking, withou question
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for Tough Mudder usage but tried them out when hiking the Delaware Water Gap... incredible... 5 stars easy. Comfy, stable, sturdy, and look good as a bonus. Can’t wait to use them in the competition..
customer_reviews.author: Avid Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box and used for a 5 mile hill climb hike in the adirondacks. Felt as sure footed as a billy goat.
customer_reviews.author: roger belz 2

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe for all conditions
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and durable shoes. The zip string style laces are very convenient in the sense that they don’t come loose or catch on stuff. The tread provides great traction on most surfaces without holding mud and stone. This is my third pair.
customer_reviews.author: CGA

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: What a great pair of sneakers. I get more compliments on these than any other pair I have ever had. They are now my favorite pair of sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Romer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe I’ve ever wore! The sole has excellent grip and the shoe is very light!
customer_reviews.author: brian e bradford

customer_reviews.title: The quality and build I expect out of Salomon
customer_reviews.text: I'm a believer. They're a bit narrow, though, so do be warned if you've got wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really love the look of these. Have several different pairs in all different colors. Sturdy construction and great for running on the trails.
customer_reviews.author: khoi

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes for me
customer_reviews.text: I have ten pairs of these shoes need I say more
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Solomon's have fit me well and given me the support I need. I was looking for a shoe that looked like a tennis shoe. This fir the bill. The speed laces are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Lea

customer_reviews.title: Even with ortholite insoles, did nto give the normal support as other salomon shoes I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Did not have the support that other salomon shoes had which I have purchased in the past. Felt like a flat shoe even with the ortholite insoles.
customer_reviews.author: scat24

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for the price, the lug type sole could be a little better patterned
customer_reviews.author: Jason Obora

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and great traction!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as they should and great traction on the soles!!!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great feel but wrong size for me
customer_reviews.text: Fit was not quite right. Would have been great but was too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brad K

customer_reviews.title: Salomon Hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, but they run a little big. I went half size smaller and fit like a glove, but if you have wide feet I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ty R.

customer_reviews.title: use experience (fit, performance)
customer_reviews.text: It's been a week since I have started using this shoe.. so far great.. Trail running seems to be fun with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the quick shoe tying.
customer_reviews.text: Never even knew this new shoe lace was a thing. Loving it. Main issue with the black is that since the shoes are pretty skinny, they do tend to look like black dress shoes when they’re clean.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and performance
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting shoe I’ve ever worn. Well with the money
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth/Greg E.

customer_reviews.title: Great trail runners
customer_reviews.text: Use these for my twice weekly seniors softball games on a desert dirt diamond..Awesome grip and good support
customer_reviews.author: Wade Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! My first pair of Salomon's, they fit perfectly, feel great on my feet, I will be buying this shoe again just to have another pair.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing show, good for trail running, all day comfort as casual see and no issues with concrete running. Favorite shoe I've earned. Quick lace system is amazing. Only way I'd switch shoes is if Brooks Launch 7's are released with the quick lace system.
customer_reviews.author: Cooke

customer_reviews.title: great support
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for their support and easy lace up...Wish they were a bit more comfortable...Overall, extremely pleased...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Margolis

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at a great cost
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit and feel great, so light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love that shoe
customer_reviews.text: Solomon, in my opinion, hit another home run. I have 5 pair of speed cross 4’s and love them. Now, here comes this shoe that makes me feel guilty about buying them!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Half a size to big
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 and they seem to be too big
customer_reviews.author: Bret Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for its price
customer_reviews.text: Recently started doing a little trail running. Picked up this pair based on research. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Have had Salomon shoes in the past that were fine. This model has not worked out. After 4 miles have foot pain. Even with aftermarket insoles the the shoes are basically unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Whitty

customer_reviews.title: Speed racer!
customer_reviews.text: Received so many positive compliments while wearing these shoes! Best pair of training shoes I ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I work law enforcement. Im a city cop that jumps from roof top to roof top and occassionally in the forest. These shoes are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mccowinj

customer_reviews.title: Solomon work for me
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove and just the right amount of support for me
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lungu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I've owned, will definitely purchase a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Brynlyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Salomon shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes , i have owned at least 10 pairs of Salomon shoes and are above all the most comfortable . I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mike farris

customer_reviews.title: 1/4 Size Large, Well-shaped to my feet aside from size!
customer_reviews.text: 1/4 Size Large, Otherwise satisfied with shoe quality and excited to take these outside. Quality Materials.
customer_reviews.author: G Carter

customer_reviews.title: Cloud walking!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Extremely light and comfortable! Amazing at first try on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Savarese

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoes
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a half size smaller then what I would normally get but awesome shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Two Months
customer_reviews.text: These lasted two and a half months before ripping here. Low quality
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoes well made and sporty looking
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes...fit me perfectly and I use it to walk, jogging
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Supercross Trail Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Super cross is made for running in all the wild places you like to go. Whether it's a daily lap around your urban park, an escape to the local trail, or something more rugged, this shoe will grip on all terrains while offering a generous cushioning to make every run great. Try a pair and embrace your wilder self.
feature_bullets: Passion for outdoor sports, new technologies and craftsmanship
Progressive gear to enable you to freely enjoy and challenge yourself in the great outdoors
